name: Impcantation Thanatosis
text: When this card is activated: You can reveal 1 "Impcantation" monster in your hand and Special Summon 2 monsters with that monster's name from your Deck, then shuffle the revealed monster into the Deck. Once per turn, if a Ritual Monster is Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only activate 1 "Impcantation Thanatosis" per turn.
